entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.8°C

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19 except minus 8 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19 except minus 8 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 9:46 PM CST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2 except plus 3 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2 except plus 3 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:46 PM CST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 9:46 PM CST Saturday 25 March 2023
